root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / Windows 7Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.8 GHz / AMD Athlon II x2 @ 2.8 GHzMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics:GeForce 8800 GTXDirectX®: DirectX 9.0c or higherHard Drive: 9 GB HDD SpaceSound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound cardRecommendedOS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / Windows 7Processor: Intel Core I7 @ 3 GHz / AMD Phenom II x4 @ 3 GHzMemory: 4 GB RAMGraphics: GeForce GTX 295DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c or higherHard Drive: 9 GB HDD SpaceSound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound card
